reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan well-constructed, lightweight, and soft, appreciating its cotton fabric and attractive appearance. The sweater is comfortable and versatile, with one customer noting it works well for both casual and dressy occasions, while another mentions it's ideal for the changing seasons. Opinions about the fit are mixed, with some finding it perfect while others say it runs big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome cotton sweater.
items.body: The second one I have purchased. Very good quality and I love that it is cotton. It is not a flimsy knit but not too heavy . Great with casual or dressy. Read more
items.author: Pduke

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive
items.body: Soft and very nice I got a 2 X and Im always afraid of the sizes. This fit perfectly, maybe just a bit roomier… material is very nice, a good fabric but lightweight. Still has warmth good looking I would buy again Read more
items.author: Stymie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Miss former quality of Lamds End products.
items.body: Not like my much worn and loved cotton cardigan. This one is looser knit and lighter weight. Read more
items.author: PAM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fit
items.body: It was a perfect fit and not to heavy Read more
items.author: Richard E.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lands End Open Front Cardigan
items.body: Extremely comfortable cotton sweater. Has nice shape, sleeves that fit over blouse or shirt without being too baggy. Has tapering waist and flattering length. Extremely attractive look, not heavy or bulky, light weight for indoor wear. It is a good value for the price. Read more
items.author: Scot Pardo

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very dark dull color
items.body: I bought Radiant Navy in XXL. It's not. It is very dark and dull, almost black. The pockets are completely sideways. You can slide your hands in them, but you can't put anything in them. The sweater is well made and very soft. The labels in mine say Lands End and 100 percent cotton. It is comfortable but not a pretty dark blue. I haven't decided if I am going to keep it or not. Expensive not to be exactly what I want. Read more
items.author: Jane Hayes

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Ivory, Radiant Navy, Black, Gray Heather. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
